amendment.description: Amendment sought to protect the ability of the Executive Branch to comply with judicial decisions interpreting the Constitution or Federal laws.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 113-378 to protect the ability of the Executive Branch to comply with judicial decisions interpreting the Constitution or Federal laws.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 231 (Roll no. 122).

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
